overview: Over a year after a highly anticipated album launch was thwarted by a pandemic, dark pop duo .gif finally brings HAIL NOTHING to the big screen.  In this first-ever live presentation of all the songs from their acclaimed 2020 record, Chew Wei Shan and Nurudin Sadali are joined by music stalwarts Charlie Lim, Sarah Teh and Bani Haykal.  Recorded at Snakeweed Studios and produced by Very Crafty Films, the special set features lush new vocal arrangements, riveting performances, transformative design, and a ton of raw emotion.
title: Hail Nothing: Live at Snakeweed
